experience.title: Professional Work Experience
experience.sub: üíº A bit about my professional journey
experience.card1.title: Jr Full-Stack Developer
experience.subtitle: Responsibilities
experience.card1.review: Ivan brought value and technical expertise to the team, improving the performance of our Technical Support team by 24%.
experience.card1.responsibility1: In charge of the Technical Support system, maintaining communication with the end customer. Investigate bugs and traces, debug and perform tests.
experience.card1.responsibility2: Develop small solutions and optimizations. Manage tasks in Jira, manage versioning in GitHub. Used to create and update technical documentation.
experience.card1.responsibility3: Used to Agile methodology, weekly sprints, dailys and transparent communication.
experience.card2.title: Jr Freelance Developer
experience.card2.review: We are very happy with Ivan's work, we were able to digitize the store, improve the brand and also manage the inventory very easily.
experience.card2.responsibility1: FullStack App Development builded with Nextjs 15, TypeScript and TailwindCSS.
experience.card2.responsibility2: Implementation of Shopping Cart, Payment Gateway and Administration Panel (create, edit and manage product stock).
experience.card2.responsibility3: Integrate database, authentication and user CRUD. Improve SEO. Optimize images, use of Cloudinary API, SSR.
showcase.title: Featured Projects
showcase.sub: üõ†Ô∏è Check code & website of those three
showcase.project1.title: Minino Malo - Ecommerce of handmade products
showcase.project1.desc: Complete Full-Stack Web App with Shopping Cart, Payment gateway, and Admin panel. Full user CRUD, Authjs, Neondb as the database, Zustand for State management, and Cloudinary as the image API.
showcase.project2.title: File Driver - Storage management and file sharing platform
showcase.project2.desc: Effortlessly upload, organize, and share files. Inspired by Giants of Google Drive and One Drive!
showcase.project3.title: Travely - A travel Agency dashboard
showcase.project3.desc: Create and find unique, customizable, AI-generated trips.

testimonials.title: What People Say About Me?
testimonials.sub: ‚≠ê Feedback from colleagues I have been fortunate to work with
testimonials.review.1: Ivan was able to increase the delivery of solutions and the performance of the Support team by 24%.
testimonials.review.2: Working with Ivan was a fantastic experience. There is nothing bad to say about him, he supports the team, brings value.... A person of 10.
testimonials.review.3: A responsible, hard-working person, I have loved sharing a team with Ivan during this year and a half.
testimonials.review.4: You can see his interest in progressing, it's incredible how he treats his colleagues, we need more people like Ivan!
testimonials.review.5: Collaborating with Ivan was a pleasure. His professionalism, speed and dedication were noticeable throughout the project.
testimonials.review.6: Iv√°n is hard-working, responsible, shines for his comradeship.... He deserves the best.
